content: While the Red Loong Dragon can be found in Chapter 1’s Black Wind Mountain, you will not be able to access and challenge this secret boss until at least Chapter 2, when you begin to explore the Yellow Wind Ridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
While the Red Loong Dragon can be found in Chapter 1’s Black Wind Mountain, you will not be able to access and challenge this secret boss until at least Chapter 2, when you begin to explore the Yellow Wind Ridge.
